CHINESE: 本系統將於今夜11:00 - 4:00進行維護，屆時或會無法連接。
ENGLISH: The system will be undergoing maintenance tonight from 11:00 pm to 4:00 am, hence it may be inaccessible temporarily.

ENGLISH:

here

CHINESE:
如八號颱風警告信號於上課時始告發出，各班須立即停課。

轉堂校巴（5, 6A, 6B, 7）將停止服務。

穿梭校巴（1A, 1B, 2, 3, 4, 8, N）將繼續行走一小時。
ENGLISH:
If Typhoon Warning Signal No. 8 is issued during class, classes must be suspended immediately.

The transfer school bus (5, 6A, 6B, 7) will stop service.

The shuttle bus (1A, 1B, 2, 3, 4, 8, N) will be maintained for one hour.

CHINESE:
因為要維持返伺服器成本，所以依家打算放小小廣告～
如果覺得太煩或者太多，可以撳

呢度

話俾我知，感激不盡！
唔好Click啲廣告～ Click左唔會有多啲錢
ENGLISH:
I want to add a little advertisement now in order to cover the expense of the server. If you find it intrusive or excessive, kindly click

here

to let me know.

CHINESE:
網站事故報告
今晨二時左右，本站進行域名轉移，使Cloudflare伺服器與本站加密證書不對稱，以致間歇性發生錯誤。有關問題已經修復，造成不便敬請見諒。
ENGLISH:
Site Incident Report
This site underwent a domain name transfer at 2:00 this morning, which made the Cloudflare server and the site's encryption certificate asymmetrical and resulted in sporadic failures. Sorry for any inconvenience; the issue is resolved.
